last_episode_to_air.name: John & Lise
last_episode_to_air.overview: Detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme make an unexpected arrest and follow a hunch to their killer's location, but he's one step ahead and stopping him will be incredibly risky.

name: Cardinal
overview: Detective John Cardinal attempts to uncover the mystery of what happened to the missing 13-year-old girl whose body is discovered in the shaft-head of an abandoned mine. At the same time, he comes under investigation by his new partner, Lise Delorme, a tough investigator in her own right.

seasons.name: Blackfly Season
seasons.overview: It’s early summer in Algonquin Bay and the blackflies aren’t the only ones out for blood. Detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme find themselves with a strange case on their hands involving a young woman with a gunshot wound to the head. The investigation quickly takes a turn as Cardinal and Delorme uncover a series of disturbing, ritualistic killings that may be connected to their young victim.

seasons.name: By the Time You Read This
seasons.overview: As Detective John Cardinal and Lise Delorme’s investigation into Algonquin Bay’s most gruesome double murder brings them precariously close to a doomsday cult with nothing to lose, Cardinal launches his own investigation into a case far more personal and dangerous. With doubts about Catherine’s suicide swirling beneath Cardinal’s placid exterior, Delorme stretched thin in her role as lead investigator on an increasingly complex, and far-reaching case, the pursuit of the killers will push them both to the breaking point. Delorme must decide whether she can trust Cardinal, or whether the death of his wife has sent him into a delusional state that puts the entire case at risk.

seasons.name: Until the Night
seasons.overview: Detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme have grown closer as friends and partners. There’s a strong bond between them that transcends the job, a bond that deepens all the time and yet remains largely unspoken. But when a seemingly mundane missing persons case turns into a spree of nightmarish murders, the ensuing investigation pushes them to their limits as detectives and partners, forcing them each to face what their future holds.

episodes.name: John Cardinal
episodes.overview: When the body of a missing girl is found, detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme set out to uncover the mystery.

episodes.name: Delorme
episodes.overview: Delorme risks the whole investigation as he tries to catch Cardinal red-handed. The killer gets closer to his next victim.

episodes.name: Edie and Eric
episodes.overview: Eric urges Edie to torture Keith, Delorme worries that Cardinal has sidelined her and Cardinal gets a break in the Curry case.

episodes.name: Woody
episodes.overview: A criminal breaks into Eric and Edie's basement and finds Keith. Issues between Cardinal and Delorme threaten their partnership. Cardinal takes risks in the investigation.

episodes.name: Keith
episodes.overview: Cardinal and Delorme know who killed Woody Baldwin, but now they must find him. Cardinal's daughter visits her mom.

episodes.name: Catherine
episodes.overview: Cardinal realizes he wasn't working alone and may be too late to save his daughter. Delorme has a decision to make when she finds answers.

episodes.name: Red
episodes.overview: Detective Jerry Commanda finds a confused, red-haired woman alone at a roadside bar with a bullet in her head. Red has no memory of who she is, how she got there, or who shot her. Even after the bullet is removed, she can’t remember anything. Commanda turns the case over to Detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme, who must protect Red while trying to uncover her identity and shooter.

episodes.name: Kevin
episodes.overview: Detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme identify the latest body as a local gun thief, their only suspect. Tracking the victim’s final days leads them to the local Northern Raiders biker gang, so they enlist the help of an expert, Staff Sergeant Alan Clegg from the Ontario Police Department (OPD).

episodes.name: Terri
episodes.overview: Detective Cardinal and Delorme retrieve security footage of Red that helps identify her as Terri Tait, a student from Vancouver, BC.

episodes.name: Toof
episodes.overview: Having tracked down Terri, Cardinal gains her trust. Terri’s recovered memories give the team new information to work with and they make progress tracking Terri’s shooter.

episodes.name: Northwind
episodes.overview: John and Lisa connect evidence from a new crime to a ritualistic murder and Terri's memories help make a connection to a possible suspect.

episodes.name: El Brujo
episodes.overview: John and Lisa race to find Ray before he kills Terri and her brother. A betrayal threatens Cardinal and Delorme's case and their lives.

2.name: Blackfly Season
2.overview: It’s early summer in Algonquin Bay and the blackflies aren’t the only ones out for blood. Detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme find themselves with a strange case on their hands involving a young woman with a gunshot wound to the head. The investigation quickly takes a turn as Cardinal and Delorme uncover a series of disturbing, ritualistic killings that may be connected to their young victim.

episodes.name: Sam
episodes.overview: As Cardinal struggles in the wake of his wife’s suicide, Delorme becomes lead detective on both a double-murder and a string of muggings.

episodes.name: Roman & Irena
episodes.overview: Cardinal and Delorme struggle to identify the victims, unaware that there is a witness to the crime, who is being stalked by the murderer.

episodes.name: Jack
episodes.overview: As Sharlene and her family hold Lloyd Kreeger captive, Cardinal and Delorme flush out an unexpected ally in their search for the killers.

episodes.name: Lemur
episodes.overview: Armed with new evidence, Cardinal and Delorme make a break in the case that could explain the motive behind the murders.

episodes.name: Mama
episodes.overview: Cardinal and Delorme uncover the identity of the Island Road killer and link the double homicide to the ATM robberies.

episodes.name: Helen
episodes.overview: Cardinal finds evidence that may prove Catherine was murdered, but he’s sidetracked by a development in the Island Road case.

3.name: By the Time You Read This
3.overview: As Detective John Cardinal and Lise Delorme’s investigation into Algonquin Bay’s most gruesome double murder brings them precariously close to a doomsday cult with nothing to lose, Cardinal launches his own investigation into a case far more personal and dangerous. With doubts about Catherine’s suicide swirling beneath Cardinal’s placid exterior, Delorme stretched thin in her role as lead investigator on an increasingly complex, and far-reaching case, the pursuit of the killers will push them both to the breaking point. Delorme must decide whether she can trust Cardinal, or whether the death of his wife has sent him into a delusional state that puts the entire case at risk.

episodes.name: Robert
episodes.overview: After a prominent Algonquin Bay politician reports her husband missing, Cardinal and Delorme suspect abduction.

episodes.name: Adele
episodes.overview: A shocking death and second abduction cause Cardinal and Delorme to believe their suspect is a professional killer for hire.

episodes.name: Barry
episodes.overview: As Cardinal and Delorme work to find a connection between the victims, they realize that not everyone’s telling the truth.

episodes.name: Neil
episodes.overview: Another abduction hits close to home as Cardinal and Delorme are caught in a race against time to save the next victim before it’s too late.

episodes.name: Scott
episodes.overview: Cardinal and Delorme close in on a secret from the past as they close in on the killer’s motives—and his identity.

episodes.name: John & Lise
episodes.overview: Detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme make an unexpected arrest and follow a hunch to their killer's location, but he's one step ahead and stopping him will be incredibly risky.

4.name: Until the Night
4.overview: Detectives John Cardinal and Lise Delorme have grown closer as friends and partners. There’s a strong bond between them that transcends the job, a bond that deepens all the time and yet remains largely unspoken. But when a seemingly mundane missing persons case turns into a spree of nightmarish murders, the ensuing investigation pushes them to their limits as detectives and partners, forcing them each to face what their future holds.
